mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY seq) AS rownum, seq, username, user_id, nickname, reg_date, status, auth FROM users WHERE auth != 'ADMIN'
select seq, title, content, nickname, create_dt, update_dt, view, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY seq) AS rownum, status, boardOption FROM board WHERE user_seq = #{seq}
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY seq) AS rownum, seq, username, user_id, nickname, reg_date, status, auth FROM users WHERE auth = 'ADMIN'

SELECT sb.* , ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY create_dt DESC) AS rownum, file.orgName, users.user_id FROM s_board sb INNER JOIN file AS file on sb.file = file.savedName INNER JOIN users AS users on sb.nickname = users.nickname ORDER BY create_dt DESC
